explains: adj. 囊的；膀胱的，[解剖] 胆囊的；胞囊的
wordGroup: cystic fibrosis 囊胞性纤维症
adenoid cystic carcinoma 腺样囊性癌；腺囊癌

sentences.en: Cystic fibrosis is the commonest fatal hereditary disease.
sentences.cn: 囊性纤维化是最常见的致命性遗传疾病。

sentences.en: Cystic fibrosis is the most common fatal genetic disease in the United States.
sentences.cn: 囊肿性纤维化在美国是最常见的致命性遗传疾病。

sentences.en: People with cystic fibroses are unable to fight off such bacteria, even though their lungs produce normal amounts of the antibiotic.
sentences.cn: 患有囊性纤维变性的人却无法抵抗这种细菌，即使他们的肺部能产生正常数量的抗生素。
